questionAnswers.question: What kind of coffee brewer are you at home?

answers.ansText: It's drip or pourover coffee for me

questionAnswers.question: What flavors do you look for in your coffee beans?

answers.ansText: I can't decide! Let's skip this question.

questionAnswers.question: Any particular way you like to serve your brew?

answers.ansText: Milk or a non-dairy milk alternative is best for me.
Cream and sugar, all the way.
All of the above! Let's skip this question.

roasters.title: Onyx
roasters.description: Onyx takes the concept of coffee transparency to great lengths, publishing their roasting and trade data on their website for curious customers to read over. They roast sustainably sourced coffees every weekday from their carbon-neutral, solar-powered facility, and live by the motto "Never Settle for Good Enough"
roasters.location:
Roastery
101 E Walnut Ave
Rogers, AR 72756
